Posts.Content: Nov 28, 2017 04:06PM MommaS wrote: I'm new here too. I have very early stage 1 slow growing cancer but I'm doing double mastectomy. There's never any guarantee but I feel better about this decision. I was talking to the plastic surgeon and he was telling me about these women that have lumpectomies and then come back 15 years later for another cancer. Every one must feel good about their own individual choice. We all have different cancers and are different people.
Posts.Title: DCIS 0 high grade and opting for Bilateral mastectomy Shakes561 Rrobin0200
